author: costin
msg: The module will set up the loggers - should replace the hacks in
configuration, and maybe allow us to plug a different logger later

author: costin
msg: Added the path-fixer module before the server.xml reader.

author: costin
msg: Added ( based on DefaultCMSetter ) a "special" module that will be
added before ServerXmlInterceptor to set the TOMCAT_HOME -
instead of having this code duplicated.
This also make sure that all modules will have full paths to deal
with ( very important for policy interceptor at least )

author: costin
msg: Add permission to write in the temp dir and it's own directory.
( watchdog does that, and it's not bad )

author: costin
msg: Contexts will be added at contextInit stage, not engineStart -
when engine is starting all config must be set in.
